lead_paragraph: Case Western Reserve University draws criticism for agreeing to accommodate 1,900 officers and National Guardsmen providing added event security.

headline.print_headline: A Plan to House Police Puts a Campus on Edge
headline.main: College at Odds With Students Over Plan to House Police for Cleveland Convention

snippet: Case Western Reserve University draws criticism for agreeing to accommodate 1,900 officers and National Guardsmen providing added event security....
abstract: Plan by city of Cleveland to house 1,900 armed police officers and National Guardsmen in Case Western Reserve University dormitories during Republican National Convention has prompted concern and opposition among students; officers are part of auxiliary force that will assist Cleveland police during convention; school will be shutdown for duration of convention.
